Collector Gutenhagen:
When I first came here, these barracks were full of Dwarves... Now they're deserted!
That is, of course, except for Yumi and me!
Yumi's on some sort or research mission, and I can't just leave her alone!
You don't look like a strong-enough fellow... Come back later if you looking for work.
(This quest can be undertaken by characters level 70 and above)
